text: Jean-Louis Koszul (; January 3, 1921 â€“ January 12, 2018) was a French mathematician. He was born in Strasbourg, France. Koszul was best known for studying geometry and discovering the Koszul complex. From 1980 until his death, Koszul was a member of the French Academy of Sciences. Koszul died on January 12, 2018 in Paris at the age of 97. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Jean-Louis Koszul at the Mathematics Genealogy Project Category:1921 births Category:2018 deaths Category:French mathematicians
title: Jean-Louis Koszul
